website_summaries.verdict: The AKG K 518 headphones are a good value for eclectic listeners who want a portable earphone that needn't be stuck into the ear.
pros: The AKG K 518 LE headphones offer a stylish yet understated design, a secure fit, and balanced audio quality
cons: Not everyone will find the AKG K 518 LE headphones comfortable, and some songs sound overly muddy

customer_reviews.title: Questioning if I even got real AKG headphones or if
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a set of the early AKG Quincy Jones headphones, which are the best set of headphones I've ever owned. In every way, except durability, I leaned on them wrong & broke an earcup off. I bought these because the specs were similar, but the were about $30 cheaper. The really feel like knock offs, the build quality is inferior to the Q model's, for the first week, I really thought the sound quality was really, really, bad. I finally noticed that the headphone plug was bent, right out of the box. I may get the Q's fixed, but I don't think I'll be buying AKG's products anymore. The 518LE headphones were that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: headphones feel nice and look great
customer_reviews.text: headphones feel nice and look great. sound is clear and bass is punchy. they feel secure once on however do tire after extended periods of use (a common problem with most full size headphones). the fold up well into the included bag nonetheless the bag offers no protection for the headphones ... would have liked the cable to be longer...
customer_reviews.author: estebinbin

customer_reviews.title: These are great all-purpose use headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are great all-purpose use headphones. Fantastic sound quality and good price too. AKG headphones never disappoint. I own their high end dj headphones and have used other high-end models as well. Love this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Justin H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: These head phones sound awesome. I really enjoy the enormous amounts of base these cans put off. I also love how you can turn them all the way up and not have to worry about blowing the internal speakers, unlike the beats by dre, with any genre of music. I did find that after wearing the cans for more than an hour per say, watching a movie or so fourth, the clamping issue comes into play, i have a shaved head being in the military and all and my head is normal size, i would say. They push hard on the ears creating annoying pain. Other than that, I have no complaints
customer_reviews.author: ballard0930

customer_reviews.title: Other Headphones are over Hyped...
customer_reviews.text: Was a little unsure about the AKG's, but very impressed. The bass dumps and are very compacted for traveling. The AKG's sound killer: not the best for classical, more for HIP-Hop, rap, Dubstep, they don't sound bad just more geared toward anything with a lot of bass. Been commuting with them to school built very well have not broken them in yet still hurt my ears after listening to them for long periods of studying, etc...My buddy got a pair of Ear candy or whatever and the AKG's blow the ear candies away, and his already broke. lol
customer_reviews.author: shaun mehl

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: nothing special and they broke quickly - not sure they even sell anymore.
customer_reviews.author: DanNyc

customer_reviews.title: Limited usage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at Christmas time for our15 year old grandson. A plastic piece recently broke off rendering the headphones unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Lesleigh Federinic

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality for the price. Also the block out a lot of outside noise which is nice. But the amount of pressure they put on your ears makes them hard to wear for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Russell R Mulvihill

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones I can barely leave the house without them
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Washington

customer_reviews.title: Bassy headphones with overall good sound.
customer_reviews.text: To keep it short, if you listen to Bassy music this are the ones for you, if you don't they still offer good sound, excellent for the price. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but a little too small
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound quality that these headphones provide! However, if you wear glasses, I don't suggest buying them (unless you have a tiny head). They get uncomfortable quickly, especially while wearing glasses.
customer_reviews.author: verve

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Headphone is amazing! price and quality! Gostei muito. Som intenso e bass forte. Ao colocar o fone no ouvido, veda muito bem o som de fora. (PT-Brasil)
customer_reviews.author: Otavio

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD BASELINE SOUND, VERY STONG, OVERALL IT IS QUITE GOOD EXCEPT IT IS TOO TIGHT, CANNOT WEAR TOO LONG
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: A gift to my friend
customer_reviews.text: the red on it is cool, and a good headphone , he seems to like it , that is good
customer_reviews.author: feiyu zhang

customer_reviews.title: Hard to say
customer_reviews.text: First, the quality is good. the audio and voice are good and it is worth for its price. However, it is too tight and i does not feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Zhaohua Huang

customer_reviews.title: Low sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations about this headphones, because of the reviews I read but the sound quality its really bad, not clear.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Huerta Casas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the sound is not clear and it is too tight!
customer_reviews.author: QihaoZhu

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, But fitting......Small!!!
customer_reviews.text: Now, I don't have a big head or a long face, but this headphone's fitting(fully extended) is seriously SMALL!!! What was AKG thinking? Did the average adult head size in this world evolved to small all of the sudden, or was this designed for kids and they forgot to label it? If it weren't for the sound quality, I would give this a negative star. Good thing I have a 8 yrs old son so I just gave it to him to use when we go on road trip or fly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound, but poor quality and ergonomics.
customer_reviews.text: After a year of use, the pleather ear cups are coming off, the headband is tight and unpadded, the plastic portion of the hard and cracked from being expanded too much. Short cable broke and I had to splice in a patch.
customer_reviews.author: W. Moy

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable! Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Very very tight! I wear glasses and earrings (I'm F 4'11'') and I can't bear having this headphones on for more than 10 minutes, it hurts! It makes my earrings and glasses to slowly stab me on the back of my ears They sound well (hence the 2 stars) but they are absolutely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, Good design, Bad fit.
customer_reviews.text: I received this headphone two days ago. The sound quality is awsome, and has sick design. However, eventhough I got small head and face, there's some pressure. I can't wear it for more than 2 hours. I'm satisfied with everything but the comfort. However, this headphone is foldable, and easy to carry. I really don't understand why AKG, the famous headphone brand made K518 LE so small. Overall, great sound, nice design, bad fit.
customer_reviews.author: sorrow

customer_reviews.title: not overwhelmingly good. I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: The cord broke after one year because for some reason it twists until it breaks. This happened on two pairs of headphones bought at the exact same time, used by two different people. also wearing them is not very confortable and the sound is ok, not overwhelmingly good. I wouldn't buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: Broke literally out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I've had other AKG headphones in the past and have always been satisfied with there durability and quality but I couldn't recommend these to anyone. I had literally just opened the box and was trying them on for the first time and the right side broke off in my hand. On closer inspection, its hardly a wonder as the piece that snapped is just a bit of chinzy plastic. I can't even give an opinion on how the bloody things sound as I hadn't even plugged them in yet. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: mats

product_meta.title: AKG K 518 LE Limited Edition Folding Headphones - Red
product_meta.description:
Color:Red| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingWhen you want a high-performance listening experience that is truely personal, block out ambient noise with the AKG K 518 LE over-ear headphones. Deisgned to deliver true AKG performance - high-output sound and excellent frequency response - from virtually any portable device they are the high-performance upgrade for improving your personal listening experience. By using complete over-the-ear cups that fit comfortably on your head, the K 518s block out ambient noise allowing you to more clear hear their exceptional dynamic range and detailed sound that is free of distortion, even at high listening levels. AKG has even made tucking these headphones away very easy as the patented 3D-Axis folding mechanism allows you to fold these headphones into very easy size to carry. Designed to be rugged, these headphones are the perfect companion for everyday use.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


SIXTY YEARS OF QUALITY SOUND, SIXTY YEARS OF AKG EXPERTISE
For more than 60 years, AKG microphones and headsets have been synonymous with professional audio excellence. Since it was founded in 1947, AKG has been passionately delivering superior-sounding, cutting-edge products. Within months of the company’s founding, its microphones were being used by radio stations, theaters and jazz clubs. A mere two years later, AKG headphones were introduced to the marketplace. 

AKG products quickly established a reputation for superior performance, and many musical artists started relying on them when it came to performing and recording. World-renowned artists used AKG products back in the 50s, while many of today’s most recognized artists swear by AKG products for live concerts and studio recording. 

More than 60 years and 1500 patents later, AKG continues to create innovative and exceptional-sounding products for both professional and personal use. So it stands to reason that the Limited Edition AKG K 518 over-ear headphones deliver outstanding performance, unparalleled comfort and unmatched reliability. Choose the brand that the pros have chosen for so many years. Hook up your iPod, or connect your stereo or nearly any other audio device to the Limited Edition AKG K 518 headphones and enjoy the ultimate listening experience. 




YOUR PERSONAL AUDIO ADVENTURE
Stand Out from the Crowd 

When you want to take your personal listening experience to the next level, the Limited Edition AKG K 518 headphones let you do it in style. The AKG 518s offer incredible comfort and unique styling, with comfortable ear cups and a closed-back design that’s perfect for extended everyday use. Although incredibly lightweight for their size, they're designed for ruggedness and reliability. The K 518s also feature the unique AKG 3D-axis folding mechanism, which allows you to easily store them when not in use. The foldable K 518s make perfect travel companions, wherever you may go. They can connect to virtually any portable audio device, including an older iPhone. And when it comes to style, you’ll definitely stand out with these headphones' rich red accents. Fold and go. Unfold and settle in. 

Superior Sound 

Just as the AKG K 518s don’t skimp on style, they don’t skimp on performance, delivering high-output sound and excellent frequency response from virtually any portable device, including the iPhone. By using a closed-back design, sound-isolating ear cups and ambient noise attenuation, the K 518s block outside noise beautifully, so all that you hear is your music. Even quiet passages are clearly audible. High-performance drivers reproduce low frequencies down to 16 Hz and high frequencies out past 24 kHz with stunning detail. They’re also designed for high SPL, which--along with their wide dynamic range and sound isolation--makes them the perfect headphone upgrade for noisy-environment listening with nearly all of today’s audio devices. 

High Quality in a Compact, Portable Package 

The hard gold-plated jack plug and contacts resist corrosion and enhance sound clarity, while the 99.99% oxygen-free cable improves sound quality. 

Reliable Compatibility 

You can use the K 518s with your home stereo, portable DVD, CD and MP3 players and many other audio/video players. With their slim, tapered connector, the K518s are compatible with all versions of the iPhone including first generation models. They’re an ideal upgrade to any portable device. 

What's in the Box 

 * One pair of white Limited Edition AKG K 518 over-ear headphones with a 1/4-inch adapter and a 1-meter-long cable
feature_bullets: Lightweight, over-the-ear design features soft ear pads for a comfortable fit that is perfect for everyday use
The isolating ear cups block more ambient noise for a more personal listening experience.
Wide dynamic range and exceptional bass response delivers accurate, high-output sound
Perfect upgrade for virtually any portable device
